name: DelegationBOF
help: LDAP checks for RBCD, Constrained, Constrained w/Protocol Transition, Unconstrained Delegation, ASREP, and Kerberoastable SPNs

arguments.name: type
arguments.desc: 1 = Constrained, 2 = ConstrainedProto, 3 = Unconstrained, 4 = RBCD, 5 = All Delegation, 6 = spn, 7 = ASREP, 8 = All Roast

arguments.name: fqdn
arguments.desc: If no domain is provided, the local domain is used.
